txt.en: 'We are close enough that I can taste victory, [placeholder]. I would see this Bârshud answer for his crimes against the peoples of Shagâna. He thinks me a fool and a child? We shall soon see which one of us is the fool.'
Speak with Mizâdi to begin the assault

'We must celebrate this victory, but I know my celebration shall be bittersweet. I meant to see the end of Bârshud, but he has survived. If left alone, he will regain an army and make war on Shagâna once more. I must think more on this, but Shagâna is not safe - cannot be safe - whilst Bârshud still breathes.\n\n'But that is a matter for another day. Now we should gather the others and celebrate this victory, incomplete as it feels to me. We have driven Bârshud out of Shagâna, and destroyed his fighting force, and that is cause enough for rejoicing today.'
Push into Dun Shûma and end the threat of Bârshud!
'We are as ready as we'll ever be. Now we must confront Bârshud and end this fight!'
Speak with Mizâdi to begin the assault.
Speak with Mizâdi in Dun Shûma in Khûd Zagin.
Speak with Mizâdi in Dun Shûma
